events.message: I want to report a car accident that happened yesterday involving another vehicle crashing into mine at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident after reviewing the initial details and accident description from the customer.
An agent has been assigned to the case to handle the investigation and guide the claimant through the process.
The insurance company has officially acknowledged the receipt of the accident claim and assured support to the customer.
Please submit all available photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and your driver’s license for further processing.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and official police report for claim assessment.
Investigation into the circumstances of the car collision has officially started, including contacting witnesses and experts.
The accident investigation has concluded, confirming the other party was at fault and damages are covered under the policy.
A settlement offer has been proposed that covers repair costs and temporary transportation expenses for the customer.
The claimant has expressed satisfaction with the prompt service and the fairness of the proposed settlement offer.
The insurance company has approved the claim and authorized payment according to the agreed settlement terms.
Payment has been successfully transferred to the customer’s account to cover all approved damages and additional costs.
The claim file has been closed after full settlement and customer confirmation that all issues have been resolved.
All documents and correspondence related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
